allow: Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "cd ''C:\NovviaERP\src\NovviaERP\NovviaERP.WPF''; dotnet clean; dotnet restore; dotnet build 2>&1 | Select-Object -Last 10")

Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$ErrorActionPreference=''Stop''; $url=''https://www.gehe-auftragsservice.de/msv3/v2.0/VerbindungTesten''; $soap=''<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""UTF-8""?><soap:Envelope xmlns:soap=""http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope"" xmlns:msv=""urn:msv3:v2""><soap:Header/><soap:Body><msv:VerbindungTesten><msv:Clientsystem>NovviaERP</msv:Clientsystem><msv:Benutzerkennung>152776</msv:Benutzerkennung><msv:Kennwort>ajrjwo30</msv:Kennwort></msv:VerbindungTesten></soap:Body></soap:Envelope>''; $auth=[Convert]::ToBase64String\([Text.Encoding]::UTF8.GetBytes\(''152776:ajrjwo30''\)\); try { $r=Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $url -Method POST -Body $soap -ContentType ''application/soap+xml'' -Headers @{Authorization=""Basic $auth""} -UseBasicParsing; $r.StatusCode; $r.Content } catch { $_Exception.Message; if\($_Exception.Response\){$sr=New-Object IO.StreamReader\($_Exception.Response.GetResponseStream\(\)\); $sr.ReadToEnd\(\)} }")

Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path ""$env:APPDATA\\NovviaERP\\logs"" -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 3 | ForEach-Object { $_FullName }")

Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Get-Process | Where-Object { $_ProcessName -like ''*Novvia*'' } | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; dotnet build ''C:\\NovviaERP\\src\\NovviaERP\\NovviaERP.WPF\\NovviaERP.WPF.csproj'' 2>&1")
Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "taskkill /F /IM NovviaERP.WPF.exe; Start-Sleep -Seconds 3; dotnet build ''C:\\NovviaERP\\src\\NovviaERP\\NovviaERP.WPF\\NovviaERP.WPF.csproj''")

Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force ''C:\\NovviaERP\\src\\NovviaERP\\NovviaERP.WPF\\bin'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force ''C:\\NovviaERP\\src\\NovviaERP\\NovviaERP.WPF\\obj'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; dotnet build ''C:\\NovviaERP\\src\\NovviaERP\\NovviaERP.WPF\\NovviaERP.WPF.csproj''")
Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Get-Process | Where-Object {$_Modules.FileName -like ''*NovviaERP*''} | Select-Object ProcessName, Id 2>&1")
